nodes.text: Battle Station Command, also known as Battlestation Command, or simply BSC, was the command agency of Battle Station Operations and was responsible for overseeing the day-to-day operations of the construction of the Death Star, and to ensure that operations were effective and efficient. Grand Moff Wilhuff Tarkin was to be the commander of the Death Star's Battle Station Operations' personnel. All command decisions regarding the Death Star would ultimately pass through him.
